item.description: A decorative chain linking two items. The chain falls when the items are far from each other horizontally but stay straight when they are aligned vertically.

field.name: chain_link_visual.max_fall
field.description: How far the chain falls, at most.

field.name: chain_link_visual.links_count
field.description: How many links in the chain (not including the ends of the chain).

field.name: chain_link_visual.dynamic_length
field.description: Indicates if the number of links is dynamically computed.
